import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./product.css"; import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; export default function Product() { const location = useLocation(); const movie = location.movie; return (

Movie

{movie.title}
id: {movie._id}
genre: {movie.genre}
year: {movie.year}
limit: {movie.limit}
); }
